message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm still really interested in the product, but I need to stick to my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11250. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $11000. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

I understand that you're sticking to your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $11000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11100. This is the absolute lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $11000. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
